content.rendered:
Understand variants like no one else. Convert more shoppers into buyers
StarApps are known to be Variant Kings as they understand variants like no one else. Starapps’ products are plug & play, risk-free to try as they don’t make any changes to your theme, and come with a free trial period. The apps support all themes and can be customized as per your needs. Their support ninjas are quick to respond, have answers to all your queries, and would go the extra mile to get the work done 🙂

Meet Star APPS!

  • Variant Swatch King– Redesign your option selection experience with variant image/ custom image/color swatches in your store, with many more “Never seen before in Swatch” features.
  • Variant Image Automator– Show only Variant Specific Images and declutter your product page. Improve your conversions & shopper’s buying journey drastically.
  • Product Description Tabs & FAQ– Show product description based on selected variant. Organize your long product descriptions in accordions & tabs.
  • Variant Title King ( Free App)-Change the product title based on the selected variant options. Help your customers to understand which variant they are looking at and adding to the cart

Benefits:

  • Built-in Star Apps integration in our themes
  • No manual coding adjustments
  • Automatically adjust Star Apps widget to theme structure

Promotion offer:

Discount 20% all Premium Plans

Condition of participation:

Users first time install Star Apps via BullTheme’s referral link
App details Get promotions
